TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PackagePartCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

remarks.format: ## Remarks The PackagePartCollection class has no public constructor. This class is created and returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<class System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator for iterating through the parts in the collection.
Docs.returns: An enumerator for iterating through the elements in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The collection accessed by the enumerator is invalidated after any change occurs to the underlying collection. The underlying collection can change when the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreatePart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.DeletePart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.

Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePartCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
